@graph.name: Cream of Mushroom Soup - Cafe Delites
@graph.description: Homemade Cream of Mushroom Soup is full flavoured and so easy to make, you won't buy soup in a can again! Ready and on your table in minutes.

@graph.name: Karina
@graph.description: Cooking is my passion, or should I say eating. What started out as a little food diary on Instagram developed into a love affair creating full flavoured recipes in the kitchen. After surviving cancer, (Stage 4 Hodgkins Lymphoma) and a lot of life's battles, including molestation, rape and abuse, I am eternally grateful to have been given a second chance. Although my life is far from perfect, I'm loving every moment. Welcome to my world of food!

@graph.name: Cream of Mushroom Soup
@graph.description: Homemade Cream of Mushroom Soup is full flavoured and so easy to make, you won't buy soup in a can again! Ready and on your table in minutes.
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup Marsala wine ((any dry red or white wine))
4 cups low sodium chicken broth (or stock)
1/2-1 teaspoons black cracked pepper (adjust to taste)
1 cup heavy cream or half and half ((sub with evaporated milk))
Chopped fresh parsley and thyme to serve

recipeInstructions.text: Heat butter and oil in a large pot over medium-high heat until melted. Sauté onion for 2 to 3 minutes until softened. Cook garlic until fragrant, about 1 minute.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat butter and oil in a large pot over medium-high heat until melted. Sauté onion for 2 to 3 minutes until softened. Cook garlic until fragrant, about 1 minute.

recipeInstructions.text: Add mushrooms and 2 teaspoons thyme, cook for 5 minutes. Pour in wine and allow to cook for 3 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Add mushrooms and 2 teaspoons thyme, cook for 5 minutes. Pour in wine and allow to cook for 3 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Sprinkle mushrooms with flour, mix well and cook for 2 minutes. Add stock, mix again and bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low-medium heat, season with salt, pepper and crumbled bouillon cubes.
recipeInstructions.name: Sprinkle mushrooms with flour, mix well and cook for 2 minutes. Add stock, mix again and bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low-medium heat, season with salt, pepper and crumbled bouillon cubes.

recipeInstructions.text: Cover and allow to simmer for 10-15 minutes, while occasionally stirring, until thickened.
recipeInstructions.name: Cover and allow to simmer for 10-15 minutes, while occasionally stirring, until thickened.

recipeInstructions.text: Reduce heat to low, stir in cream or half and half. Allow to gently simmer (do not boil). Adjust salt and pepper to your taste.
recipeInstructions.name: Reduce heat to low, stir in cream or half and half. Allow to gently simmer (do not boil). Adjust salt and pepper to your taste.

recipeInstructions.text: Mix in parsley and remaining thyme. Serve warm.
recipeInstructions.name: Mix in parsley and remaining thyme. Serve warm.
